# The `DGNode` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/dependencygraph">DependencyGraph</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> that points to an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> and contains memory dependency edges. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::sandboxir::DGNode</CodeBlock>

## Derived Classes

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/memdgnode">MemDGNode</a></>}>
A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/dependencygraph">DependencyGraph</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> for instructions that may read/write memory, or have some ordering constraints, like with stacksave/stackrestore and alloca/inalloca. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/memdgnode/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/dependencygraph">DependencyGraph</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> that points to an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> and contains memory dependency edges.

### getSchedBundle() {#ac225caf79ca52b84701da01c7f168d24}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SchedBundle &#42; llvm::sandboxir::DGNode::getSchedBundle () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
\\Returns the scheduling bundle that this node belongs to, or nullptr.

### preds() {#a9a698f16d29354015faebe94a0c3457f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>iterator&#95;range&lt; iterator &gt; llvm::sandboxir::DGNode::preds (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/dependencygraph">DependencyGraph</a> &amp; DAG) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
\\Returns a range of DAG predecessors nodes.

If this is a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/memdgnode">MemDGNode</a> then this will also include the memory dependency predecessors. Please note that this can include the same node more than once, if for example it&#39;s both a use-def predecessor and a mem dep predecessor.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/dependencygraph-h/#l00154">154</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/dependencygraph-h">DependencyGraph.h</a>.

### isMemDepCandidate() {#a2e539bf766322a8813af1cbe288b8332}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool llvm::sandboxir::DGNode::isMemDepCandidate (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
We consider <code>I</code> as a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memory">Memory</a> Dependency Candidate instruction if it reads/write memory or if it has side-effects.

This is used by the dependency graph.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/dependencygraph-h/#l00176">176</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/dependencygraph-h">DependencyGraph.h</a>.
